effect.scarlet_violet: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.the_teal_mask: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.
